summary: Completed comprehensive final verification testing of Instituto Jussara Kaisel mentorship portal. All requested features working correctly including mobile sidebar with scroll, editable profile with country/currency/phone dropdowns, calendar with Calendly/YouCanBookMe links, sessions and financial data from all mentorias, admin scheduling settings saved to database, and mentoria showcase with locked content.
passed_tests: Admin login authentication (jussarakaiselvc@gmail.com)
Mentorada login authentication (karina_kiriki@icloud.com)
Mobile sidebar menu with all items including Perfil
Mobile sidebar scrolling functionality
Profile country dropdown with flags and proper selection
Profile currency dropdown with symbols (BRL, USD, JPY)
Profile phone input with country code display
Profile save functionality with success notifications
Calendar page Calendly scheduling link (https://calendly.com/jussara-kaisel-test)
Calendar page YouCanBookMe scheduling link (https://jussara-kaisel.youcanbook.me)
Calendar responsive design on mobile
Sessions page displaying sessions from ALL mentorias (9 sessions found)
Sessions page responsive design
Financial page displaying data from all mentorias (R$ 4.058,00 total)
Financial page progress bar and parcelas list (15 parcelas)
Financial page responsive design
Minha Mentoria current mentoria info (A TRAVESSIA)
Minha Mentoria diagnostico section (PDF, pontos-chave, foco atual)
Minha Mentoria showcase with locked/unlocked mentorias (7 cards)
Admin panel scheduling settings (GET /api/admin/scheduling-settings)
Admin panel scheduling settings save (PUT /api/admin/scheduling-settings)
Admin panel agendamentos tab functionality
Admin panel financeiro tab access
Admin panel navigation between tabs
Scheduling links API endpoints working correctly
Profile update API with country/currency/phone
Sessions from all mentorias API functionality
Financial data from all mentorias API functionality
Mentoria showcase API with proper access control
Dynamic parcela management API (add/edit/delete endpoints)
External link security (noopener noreferrer attributes)
Responsive design across all tested pages
